pkgmetadata.longdescription: Non-Parametric Tests of Independence Between Random Vectors // Functions for non-parametric tests of independence (mutual or serial) between some quantitative random vectors, as described in Bilodeau M. and Lafaye de Micheaux P. (2009) doi:10.1016/j.jspi.2008.11.006, in Beran R., Bilodeau M. and Lafaye de Micheaux P. (2007) doi:10.1016/j.jmva.2007.01.009 and in Fan Y., Lafaye de Micheaux P., Penev S. and Salopek D. (2017) doi:10.1016/j.jmva.2016.09.014.
